Enable automatic invocation of completion list
Date format:
setting.description:
The following letters will be replaced:
d - day of month, 1-31
D - day of month, 01-31
m - month, 1-12
M - month, 01-12
y - year, 00-99
Y - year, 0000-9999
All other characters are copied.

setting.caption: Time format:
setting.description:
The following letters will be replaced:
h - hour, 0-24
H - hour, 00-24
m - minute, 0-59
M - minute, 00-59
s - second, 0-59
S - second, 00-59
All other characters are copied.

setting.caption: Re-format numbers
setting.description: If unchecked, prints decimal numbers as returned from server

setting.caption: Maximize data grid after execution of SELECT statement
Only when result set has more than [VALUE] records
Log DML statements
setting.description:
Should the logging work for DML statements too.
If unchecked only DDL statements are logged.

setting.caption: Enable logging to file
setting.description: Logs all successful DDL statements to file

setting.caption: Log file name:
setting.description:
For multiple files place %d mark where you want numbers to be inserted.
If you wish leading zeros use %0xd, where x is a number of digits (ex. %02d)

setting.caption: Add header to each statement
setting.description:
Should logging add a header showing the context in which statement was run:
FlameRobin version, database, username, timestamp

setting.caption: Enable logging to database
setting.description:
Logs all successful DDL statements to database.
This will create a table named FLAMEROBIN_LOG into your databases.

setting.caption: Use generator instead of 1+max(id)
setting.description:
If not checked, logging will do a "select max(id)+1" to create
keys for flamerobin_log table. This can be slow if
there is a huge amount of records in it.
